dna_translation.label: DNA Translation
instructions: Produce mRNA for membrane proteins, start DNA transcription.
mRNA quantity achieved, stop DNA transcription.

dna_transcription.label: DNA Translation
instructions: Need to generate more neurotransmitter proteins from mRNA, start DNA translation.
Cell stressors present, stop DNA translation.

membrane_diffusion.label: Membrane Diffusion
instructions: Chlorine ion gradient ready, allow membrane diffusion.
-90mV resting potential achieved over membrane , disable membrance diffusion.

active_ion_channel.label: Ion Channels
instructions: Need Potassium ions, engage ion channels.
Ion gradient achieved, disable ion channels.

create_vesicle.label: Create Vesicle
instructions: Synaptic vesicles needed to deliver neurotransmitter, generate vesicles.

release_lysosomes.label: Release Lysosomes
instructions: Foreign toxins in cytoplasm, release the lysosomes.

spike_neuron.label: Spike Neuron
instructions: Synaptic signal received, fire the action potential!

osmosis.label: Osmosis
instructions: Excess cytoplasmic water detected, allow osmosis
Dangerous concentration gradient, stop osmosis

manage_ph.label: Manage pH
instructions: External carboxylic acid detected, increase internal pH.
Anaerobic excess basic CO2 in cell, decrease internal pH.

mitosis.label: Mitosis
instructions: Hormonal signals for neurogenesis received, engage mitotic process.

aerobic_respiration.label: Aerobic Respiration
instructions: Oxygen available, engage aerobic respiration.
Insufficient oxygen, disable aerobic respiration.

inhibition.label: Inhibition
instructions: Presynaptic GABA-ergic neuron fired, enter inhibited state.

excitation.label: Excitation
instructions: Acetylcholine accepted by incoming synapse, enter excitory state.

glucose_pump.label: Glucose Pump
instructions: Glucose available in interstitial space, engage glucose pump.

chemoreceptors.label: Chemoreceptors
instructions: Olfactory signal inbound, monitor chemoreceptors.
